issues.title: Create core data models for Chief of Staff
issues.body:
## Description

Create all the data models defined in the engineering spec for the Chief of Staff agent. These models form the foundation for state tracking, goal management, and autopilot functionality.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] `GoalStatus` enum with PENDING, IN_PROGRESS, DONE, PARTIAL, SKIPPED, BLOCKED
- [ ] `CheckpointTrigger` enum with all 7 trigger types
- [ ] `DailyGoal` dataclass with `to_dict()` and `from_dict()` methods
- [ ] `Decision` dataclass with `to_dict()` and `from_dict()` methods
- [ ] `WorkLogEntry` dataclass with `to_dict()` and `from_dict()` methods
- [ ] `StandupSession` dataclass with `to_dict()` and `from_dict()` methods
- [ ] `DailySummary` dataclass with `to_dict()` and `from_dict()` methods
- [ ] `DailyLog` dataclass with `to_dict()` and `from_dict()` methods
- [ ] State snapshot models: `GitState`, `FeatureSummary`, `BugSummary`, `PRDSummary`, `SpecSummary`, `TestState`, `GitHubState`, `InterruptedSession`, `RepoStateSnapshot`
- [ ] Recommendation models: `Recommendation`, `AttentionItem`, `StandupReport`
- [ ] Autopilot models: `CheckpointEvent`, `AutopilotSession`
- [ ] All models have proper type hints
- [ ] Unit tests for serialization round-trips

## Interface Contract (REQUIRED)

**Pattern Reference:** See existing dataclasses in `swarm_attack/models/` for the expected pattern.

**Required Methods:**
- `to_dict(self) -> dict[str, Any]` - Instance method to serialize to dictionary
- `from_dict(cls, data: dict[str, Any]) -> ClassName` - Classmethod to create from dictionary

## Technical Notes

- File: `swarm_attack/chief_of_staff/models.py`
- Use `dataclasses.dataclass` and `dataclasses.field`
- Use `datetime.datetime` and `datetime.date` for time handling
- Enums should use string values for JSON compatibility
- Nested dataclasses should serialize recursively

**Pattern Reference:** See `swarm_attack/config.py:BugBashConfig` for the expected pattern.

**Required Methods:**
- `from_dict(cls, data: dict) -> ChiefOfStaffConfig` - Classmethod to create from dictionary

## Technical Notes

- Default values should match spec Section 9.1
